author: Nathaniel Meyersohn and Sara Ashley O'Brien, CNN Business
title: Stores are scrambling to get masks for their workers. It's no easy task
description: Aside from health care workers, no one is more exposed to coronavirus than the workers continuing to show up to grocery stores and warehouses to ensure people have access to essential goods.
content:
New York (CNN Business)Aside from health care workers, no one is more exposed to coronavirus than the workers continuing to show up to grocery stores and warehouses to ensure people have access to essential goods.
